languages.text: "Если есть способ заставить их говорить — значит, надо использовать его".
"If there is something that will make them talk, we must use it."
languages.original_text: "Если есть способ заставить их говорить — значит, надо использовать его".

traits.locale_text: "If there is something that will make them talk, we must use it."
"If there is something that will make them talk, we must use it."
"If there is something that will make them talk, we must use it."
"If there is something that will make them talk, we must use it."

languages.text: “只要有办法能让他们开口，我们就必须试试看。”
languages.original_text: "If there is something that will make them talk, we must use it."

traits.locale_text: “只要有办法能让他们开口，我们就必须试试看。”

languages.text: «Si hay algo capaz de hacer que hablen, es nuestro deber usarlo».
languages.original_text: "If there is something that will make them talk, we must use it."

traits.locale_text: «Si hay algo capaz de hacer que hablen, es nuestro deber usarlo».

languages.text: 「彼らに話をさせられる何かがあるのなら、それを使う必要がある」
languages.original_text: "If there is something that will make them talk, we must use it."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らに話をさせられる何かがあるのなら、それを使う必要がある」

languages.text: "Falls es etwas gibt, das sie zum Sprechen bringt, müssen wir es einsetzen."
languages.original_text: "If there is something that will make them talk, we must use it."

traits.locale_text: "Falls es etwas gibt, das sie zum Sprechen bringt, müssen wir es einsetzen."

languages.text: « S'il existe un moyen de les faire parler, nous devons essayer. »
languages.original_text: "If there is something that will make them talk, we must use it."

traits.locale_text: « S'il existe un moyen de les faire parler, nous devons essayer. »

languages.text: "Konuşmalarını sağlayacak bir şey varsa bunu kullanmalıyız."
languages.original_text: "If there is something that will make them talk, we must use it."

traits.locale_text: “Konuşmalarını sağlayacak bir şey varsa bunu kullanmalıyız.”
